name: Coloring Book 31 The Night Before Christmas
name_original: Coloring Book 31 The Night Before Christmas
description: Read and color the illustrated version of everyone's favorite classic poem, The Night Before Christmas by Clement Clarke Moore. This 15 page coloring book app is filled with illustrations of holiday cheer! A perfect app to ring in the holiday season as well as a way to read the traditional poem on the night before Christmas. Relive your childhood memories with your child, grandchild, niece, or nephew!
